Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item comes with a range of features that promise to enhance your daily experience. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, I'm offering you the chance to own this product for $120. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
